Line 94: Line 94:
===Comics and animation===
===Comics and animation===
In the [[manga]] and [[anime]] series ''[[Hetalia: Axis Powers]]'' by Hidekaz Himaruya, which features [[stereotype]]d [[moe anthropomorphism|anthropomorphic]] personifications of countries and empires, Sealand is a character. Sealand is described as the smallest character in the series, a reference to the fact it is, "The smallest (unofficial) nation in the world". He is depicted as having short blond hair and wearing a blue and white sailor suit. His obscurity reaches far beyond the grasp of the real Sealand.<ref>{{Cite comic|writer=Himaruya, Hidekaz|title=[[Hetalia: Axis Powers]]|volume=2|date=10 December 2008|publisher=[[Tokyopop]]|page=24}}</ref>
In the [[manga]] and [[anime]] series ''[[Hetalia: Axis Powers]]'' by Hidekaz Himaruya, which features [[stereotype]]d [[moe anthropomorphism|anthropomorphic]] personifications of countries and empires, Sealand is a character. Sealand is described as the smallest character in the series, a reference to the fact it is, "The smallest (unofficial) nation in the world". He is depicted as having short blond hair and wearing a blue and white sailor suit. His obscurity reaches far beyond the grasp of the real Sealand.<ref>{{Cite comic|writer=Himaruya, Hidekaz|title=[[Hetalia: Axis Powers]]|volume=2|date=10 December 2008|publisher=[[Tokyopop]]|page=24}}</ref>
